title: HoP 107 - Practice Makes Perfect - Christian Asceticism
itunes:title: HoP 107 - Practice Makes Perfect - Christian Asceticism
description: Christian ascetics like Antony, Macrina and Evagrius create a new ethical ideal by pushing the human capacity for self-control to its limits.
